bodyweight.name: Push-Up
bodyweight.description: Standard push-up from floor, hands shoulder-width apart
bodyweight.cues: Body straight line | Lower until chest near floor | Elbows 45°

bodyweight.name: Diamond Push-Up
bodyweight.description: Push-up with hands together forming diamond shape
bodyweight.cues: Thumbs and index fingers touch | Elbows close to body

bodyweight.name: Pike Push-Up
bodyweight.description: Inverted V position push-up targeting shoulders
bodyweight.cues: Hips high in downward dog | Lower head between hands | Drive through shoulders

bodyweight.name: Decline Push-Up
bodyweight.description: Push-up with feet elevated on bench or box
bodyweight.cues: Feet on elevated surface | Body straight | Full range of motion

bodyweight.name: Dip (Parallel Bars)
bodyweight.description: Vertical press on parallel bars for chest and triceps
bodyweight.cues: Lean forward for chest | Stay upright for triceps | Full depth

bodyweight.name: Bench Dip
bodyweight.description: Dip using bench behind for support
bodyweight.cues: Hands on bench edge | Feet extended | Lower to 90° arms

bodyweight.name: Handstand Push-Up (Wall)
bodyweight.description: Inverted vertical press against wall
bodyweight.cues: Kick up to wall | Lower head to floor | Press through shoulders

bodyweight.name: Archer Push-Up
bodyweight.description: Wide push-up shifting weight to one arm
bodyweight.cues: One arm extends out | Shift weight to working arm | Control descent

bodyweight.name: Pull-Up
bodyweight.description: Overhand grip vertical pull
bodyweight.cues: Grip wider than shoulders | Pull chin over bar | Lead with chest

bodyweight.name: Chin-Up
bodyweight.description: Underhand grip vertical pull emphasizing biceps
bodyweight.cues: Supinated grip shoulder-width | Pull chest to bar | Squeeze at top

bodyweight.name: Inverted Row
bodyweight.description: Horizontal pull from bar at waist height
bodyweight.cues: Body straight under bar | Pull chest to bar | Squeeze shoulder blades

bodyweight.name: Muscle-Up
bodyweight.description: Explosive pull transitioning to dip above bar
bodyweight.cues: Explosive pull | Lean forward at transition | Press to lockout

bodyweight.name: Australian Pull-Up (Feet Elevated)
bodyweight.description: Inverted row with feet elevated for increased difficulty
bodyweight.cues: Feet on box | Body straight | Pull chest to bar

bodyweight.name: Archer Pull-Up
bodyweight.description: Wide pull-up shifting weight to one arm
bodyweight.cues: Wide grip | Shift to one arm at top | Control descent

bodyweight.name: Scapular Pull-Up
bodyweight.description: Shoulder blade engagement from dead hang
bodyweight.cues: Start in dead hang | Retract scapulae only | No elbow bend

bodyweight.name: Bodyweight Squat
bodyweight.description: Fundamental squatting pattern
bodyweight.cues: Chest up | Knees track toes | Full depth below parallel

bodyweight.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
bodyweight.description: Single-leg squat with rear foot elevated
bodyweight.cues: Rear foot on bench | Torso upright | Knee tracks toe

bodyweight.name: Pistol Squat
bodyweight.description: Full single-leg squat with other leg extended
bodyweight.cues: Balance on one leg | Opposite leg forward | Full depth

bodyweight.name: Jump Squat
bodyweight.description: Explosive squat with vertical jump
bodyweight.cues: Squat to parallel | Explode up | Soft landing

bodyweight.name: Cossack Squat
bodyweight.description: Lateral squat with one leg extended
bodyweight.cues: Shift weight to one side | Other leg straight | Keep heel down

bodyweight.name: Glute Bridge
bodyweight.description: Hip extension from supine position
bodyweight.cues: Feet flat on floor | Drive through heels | Squeeze glutes at top

bodyweight.name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
bodyweight.description: Unilateral glute bridge
bodyweight.cues: One leg extended | Drive through heel | Level hips

bodyweight.name: Nordic Curl
bodyweight.description: Eccentric hamstring curl from kneeling
bodyweight.cues: Anchor feet | Lower slowly | Use hamstrings to brake

bodyweight.name: Reverse Hyperextension
bodyweight.description: Hip extension with torso supported
bodyweight.cues: Torso on bench | Lift legs behind | Squeeze glutes

bodyweight.name: Forward Lunge
bodyweight.description: Step forward into lunge position
bodyweight.cues: Big step forward | Knee over ankle | Push back to start

bodyweight.name: Reverse Lunge
bodyweight.description: Step backward into lunge position
bodyweight.cues: Step back | Lower knee toward floor | Drive through front heel

bodyweight.name: Walking Lunge
bodyweight.description: Continuous lunges with forward movement
bodyweight.cues: Alternating legs | Upright torso | Controlled steps

bodyweight.name: Plank
bodyweight.description: Isometric core hold in push-up position
bodyweight.cues: Forearms or hands | Body straight | Brace core

bodyweight.name: Hanging Leg Raise
bodyweight.description: Leg raise from bar hang
bodyweight.cues: Dead hang | Lift legs to 90° or higher | Control descent

bodyweight.name: L-Sit
bodyweight.description: Isometric hold with legs extended parallel to floor
bodyweight.cues: Hands on floor or bars | Legs straight out | Shoulders depressed

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Swing (Two-Hand)
kettlebell.description: Hip hinge ballistic movement with kettlebell
kettlebell.cues: Hip snap | Arms straight | Bell to shoulder height

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Swing (One-Hand)
kettlebell.cues: Rotate at top | Anti-rotation through core | Switch hands

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Snatch
kettlebell.cues: High pull | Punch through at top | Soft catch

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Clean
kettlebell.cues: High elbow pull | Rotate bell around wrist | Soft rack

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Clean & Press
kettlebell.cues: Clean to rack | Tight core | Press overhead

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Jerk
kettlebell.description: Explosive overhead press with leg drive
kettlebell.cues: Dip and drive | Get under bell | Lock out

kettlebell.name: Goblet Squat
kettlebell.cues: Bell at chest | Elbows between knees | Full depth

kettlebell.name: Double Kettlebell Front Squat
kettlebell.description: Front squat with two kettlebells in rack
kettlebell.cues: Double rack position | Elbows up | Deep squat

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Press
kettlebell.cues: Tight lat | Vertical forearm | Lock out overhead

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Push Press
kettlebell.description: Overhead press with leg drive assistance
kettlebell.cues: Quick dip | Drive through legs | Press overhead

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Row
kettlebell.cues: Hinge at hips | Pull to hip | Squeeze shoulder blade

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Renegade Row
kettlebell.description: Row from plank position on two kettlebells
kettlebell.cues: Plank on bells | Row one arm | Anti-rotation

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Deadlift
kettlebell.description: Hip hinge with kettlebell between feet
kettlebell.cues: Hinge at hips | Neutral spine | Drive through floor

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Single-Leg Deadlift
kettlebell.cues: One leg back | Hinge forward | Level hips

kettlebell.name: Turkish Get-Up
kettlebell.description: Full body movement from floor to standing with overhead weight
kettlebell.cues: Eyes on bell | Controlled movement | Reverse to floor

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Farmer's Carry
kettlebell.cues: Shoulders back | Tight core | Controlled steps

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Rack Lunge
kettlebell.description: Lunge with kettlebell in rack position
kettlebell.cues: Bell in rack | Step forward | Drive through front heel

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Windmill
kettlebell.cues: Bell locked out | Hinge to side | Eyes on bell

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Halo
kettlebell.cues: Bell bottom-up | Tight circle | Both directions

kettlebell.name: Kettlebell Thruster
kettlebell.cues: Squat deep | Drive up explosively | Press at top
